name: Chrono Girl
description:
A game made for Brackeys Jam 2020.2,  the theme is :Rewind.

A scientist girl with time rewinding machine is trapped in a laboratory full of hostile robots. She has to survive incoming waves using her time rewinding machine.

Game Mechanics

W/A/S/D - Move

Space - Use chronosphere (Time rewinding machine)

Collect Batteries to recharge chronosphere. Rewind the robots to make them collide or run into laser fences. Survive as long as you can.

Future Updates

We are currently in early-development (Alpha) state and still improving.

We will add a story and make levels with themes like Jurassic, Future, Ancient Society, etc...

More improved graphics and more time-control related mechanics are coming soon...
